Reviews

Review by - Yelp

Julie R:

Came here to have a couple drinks before dinner and their she crab soup was some of the best I have ever had. It was so fresh and came with a baguette to dip in it. The wine stations were pretty awesome as well and improbably tried about four different wines...

Review by - Yelp

Lowanda J:

Dropped in for some wine after dinner. My guest was a regular so I felt like VIP when we entered. We were greeted with hugs and smiles and once they found out we were celebrating my birthday, they treated us to a toast of Prosecco! Such a sweet gesture!

Review by - Yelp

Cindy P:

Great HAPPY HOUR. Very good drinks but the SHE CRAB SOUP was AMAZING. The stuffed mushrooms were also very good. We came to town for 2 days and went to Uncork both days. Great staff. Thanks

Review by - Yelp

Paige P:

Brought my girls here for a fun night for my bachelorette and loved everything about it! We enjoyed the live music, fun drinks, boards, at beautiful atmosphere!

Review by - Yelp

Pamela H:

Fantastic! Terrific food- try the crostini with strawberries, goat cheese and basalmic glaze= delicious. Several seating choices, we selected the arm chairs. Super comfy. Nice selection of wines, giving you the option to have a one, three, or six ounce pour...
Stop reviews carousel Play reviews carousel

[Page Title: Uncork Charleston - events]

Events

Sunday Strings with Claire Allen

Sunday January 18th

Is there any better way to tie off the weekend than with drinks and beautiful music? The very talented, Claire Allen will take the stage at 3pm. Get a glass, get comfortable, and have a day!

03:00 PM - 06:00 PM

F&B Tuesdays

Tuesday January 20th

Every Tuesday

Can you relate? Food & Bev industry folks get some very special discounts every Tuesday at Uncork! Featuring $6 Vodka or Tequila Sodas AND $6 Lemon Drop Martinis-- Start your night off here!

04:00 PM - 11:00 PM

Dance Night

Wednesday January 21st

Wednesdays every 2 weeks

Every other Wednesday means dancing and tasting with star instructor, Kim Lyons! Hit her Instagram bio to sign up @KimRLyons !

07:00 PM - 11:00 PM

Friday Night Music: Phil Blackstone

Friday January 23rd

Every Friday

Happy Friday! Come kick back with good tunes and even better vibes with local talent, Phil Blackstone. We'll have the wine wall rolling as usual, plus beers and specialty cocktails all night long. See y'all then!

07:00 PM - 10:00 PM

Saturday Night Music: Anna Bradley

Saturday January 24th

Every Saturday

This is your perfect Saturday night... Whether you're starting a big night on the town or just getting out of the house for dinner, we'll have the wine, food, and music to make it a good one! We've got the very talented, Anna Bradley taking the stage from 7-10pm. Come for the music, stay for the wine!

07:00 PM - 10:00 PM

Sunday Strings with Claire Allen

Sunday January 25th

Every Sunday

Is there any better way to tie off the weekend than with drinks and beautiful music? The very talented, Claire Allen will take the stage at 3pm. Get a glass, get comfortable, and have a day!

03:00 PM - 06:00 PM

Red Party with Orin Swift Wines

Thursday February 12th

It's an Orin Swift Red Party takeover at Uncork—one night of all-red everything for the bold, the reckless, and the best dressed. Taste some of the rarest, most exclusive wines from the iconic producer, enter a rare-wine raffle, shop select Orin Swift bottles, & snack on a themed charcuterie + dessert bar.

Tickets won’t last—secure yours before this one sells out at https://www.citypapertickets.com/events/179425684/the-red-party

07:00 PM - 10:00 PM
